channel.title: The Rykerr Medical Podcast
channel.description: Rykerr Medical LLC is a platform for education focused on emergency, transport, and critical care medicine.
channel.itunes:author: Rykerr Medical

item.title: Trauma Questions and More w/ Doc Fisher
item.itunes:author: Rykerr Medical

item.title: Articulating Thoughts with the Ryans
item.description:
This is a recorded session of tutoring with SFCEBM. Ryan from Rykerr Medical chats with Ryan from Canada about how to explain concepts and thought processes as he works through a mentorship program.
episode webpage: https://archive.org/details/articulating-thoughts-with-the-ryans_202502
www.rykerrmedical.com to see what else is going on with the project
item.itunes:author: Rykerr Medical

item.title: Ukraine Chat with Sarah and Jason
item.description:
Sarah is a brand-new EMT currently working in Ukraine with an NGO called CADUS. Jason is a nurse/ medic who worked with her over there earlier this year through GRM, another NGO. This is a conversation the three of us had to both catch up on things and share the story with you.
episode webpage: https://archive.org/details/ukraine-chat-with-sarah-and-jason_202502
www.rykerrmedical.com to see what else is going on with the project
item.itunes:author: Rykerr Medical

item.title: Sleep Discussion with MandoMedic
item.description:
In this episode we discuss strategies to improve and optimize sleep while working 24 and 48 hour shifts as we often do in EMS. Our guest is MandoMedic; he hails from the European Medics community and you can find him either on their Discord channel or on Instagram @TheMandoMedic.
episode webpage: https://archive.org/details/sleep-discussion-with-mando-medic_202502
www.rykerrmedical.com to see what else is going on with the project
item.itunes:author: Rykerr Medical

item.title: Patient Assessment in EMS and CCT
item.description:
This episode is just one voice chatting about how we do patient assessment in EMS, how that differs from the way we do it in nursing, and then how we can come up with an ideal blend to put to work in the critical care transport setting.
episode webpage: https://archive.org/details/patient-assessment-in-ems-and-cct
www.rykerrmedical.com to see what else is going on with the project
item.itunes:author: Rykerr Medical

item.title: EMS in Haiti with Claudel and Armadeus
item.description:
The primary story here is getting Claudel to medic school in order to become Haitiâ€™s first paramedic. He needs your support, so check it out and see what can be done. We also mention some other cool stuff along the way. www.empacthaiti.org. And as always, let us know what you think!
episode webpage: https://archive.org/details/ems-in-haiti-with-claudel-and-armadeus_202502
www.rykerrmedical.com to see what else is going on with the project
item.itunes:author: Rykerr Medical

item.title: Scripts Discussion with Richard
item.description:
In this episode we discuss the idea of creating scripts for learning protocols and refining procedures with Richard Templeman, a flight paramedic in Nevada. We talk about the development of the idea, outline how we've used it personally, and provide examples of how you can do the same in your own clinical practice. Let us know what you think and reach out with any questions.
episode webpage: https://archive.org/details/scripts-discussion-with-richard_202502
www.rykerrmedical.com to see what else is going on with the project
item.itunes:author: Rykerr Medical

item.title: What is Up at Rykerr Medical?
item.description:
This episode is a short introduction to both the podcast and Rykerr Medical in general. Take a listen and let us know what you think!
episode webpage: https://archive.org/details/what-is-up-at-rykerr-medical_202502
